Detailed Source Reference
-------------------------

The pyioflash package provides the following classes as a user interface,
SimulationData and SimulationPlot. These classes provide the methods and functionality
necessary to read, manipulate, and plot the simulation data contained in FLASH4 hdf5
output files.

The following pages document the package modules, classes, and methods in detail.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 4

   module_pyio
   module_plot
   module_collections
   module_types
   module_utility
   module_options
